titles.title: Providing for a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the House of Representatives.
Providing for a committee to notify the President of the assembly of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for appointment of a House of Representatives committee to notify the President that a quorum of the House has assembled.
